title: Strengthening Mobile App Development Capabilities: Evidence-Based Design of Mobile Learning (mLearning) Content

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three principles for designing integrated text-to-speech-to-image messages optimized for mobile environments.
Learners can produce at least one mLearning content piece applying accessibility-enhancing strategies based on Universal Design for Learning (UDL) guidelines.
Learners can write feedback reports to improve the effectiveness of mLearning content by analyzing formative assessment data.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
